channel.title: Czar renovation
channel.description:
I am completely redoing Project Czar.
It's a good base but I need to make alot of changes on it... Alot.
-I am completely re-doing the saving methods, because the old ones were useless. -Cleaning it in general [s]-Characters get created. -Character do not load.[/s] -Characters load and save. -Re-writing ALL of the class files. -Little to no spam is sent in the command window. -I have re-written over 50% of the class client, with my own conventions. -Packets 155 and 17 are now handled with a switch statement. -When performing a special attack, you cannot hit more than the NPC's HP.
[s]I have removed all saving/reading methods for characters.[/s] I have added different saving/reading methods for characters.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/15whtfm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/5lpcv8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2iawtnl.png[/img]

item.title: Czar renovation
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:5, topic:267789”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=353523.msg2709267#msg2709267 date=1237197208]
Good luck with this! Are you only cleaning it up, or adding features also?
[/quote]

I’m cleaning it up, but I will also release my own variations of it with features.[/quote]

Hey; I cleaned up the look of everything a little bit by organizing.

I also added a separate class for the commands witch reduced the client class size.

You can download it here:
Download Link Here!

Credits -

Ziplock 3%

Kihomura - 97%

(I am only taking 3% because it took me about 20 minuets…)

Screen shot of layout.

screeny.jpg796×592

I Created a bin and SourceFile folder so its not all a crowded mess of java and class files.

I also configured all player writing, reading, object loading, ect to the new layout.

Read full topic

item.title: Czar renovation
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:28, topic:267789”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=353523.msg2713183#msg2713183 date=1237462236]
Well; you are defiantly cleaning, but don’t take to much. People will still want the inventory system working.

As my Client class is only 290KB, but I would like to see you knock a czar to that.
[/quote]

Don’t worry, I’m leaving some of the useful working stuff. I’m removing crappy things such as the horrible smithing that was in there. I’m removing the prayer. He had like 5 methods per skill added into the class client and I’m removing them all.

Also, I’m planning on updating the download link in the download section, I got the class client to 320kb.[/quote]

Ooh; just noticed the download link. I guess I will download it and check it out.

Read full topic

Update again:

Another update:

Class client 377kb.[/quote]

Well; you are defiantly cleaning, but don’t take to much. People will still want the inventory system working.

As my Client class is only 290KB, but I would like to see you knock a czar to that.

item.title: Czar renovation
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Update: I had encountered an error involving NPC combat, but it has been fixed.

I’m now going to focus in on the size of the class client, it’s currently 545kb, and that is very chunky. So for the next day or so (I work fast), I will be focusing on file size.

Jamie1200:

On Average how big ideally would you like it to be?

I say about 200-300kb.

item.title: Czar renovation
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:12, topic:267789”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=353523.msg2710095#msg2710095 date=1237247771]

Good luck with this! Are you only cleaning it up, or adding features also?

I’m cleaning it up, but I will also release my own variations of it with features.

Can I suggest a few features you might add?
~ Working prayer
~ Working defense bonuses [Levels and item bonuses]
~ Just cleaning up some of the combat and making it better

And yeah, there are a lot of unneeded processes in Czar. Good luck cleaning it out.
[/quote]

Prayer might be a bit difficult, but I’ll see what I can do (I know how to get the protect prayers working ;))
I think I can do defence bonuses and combat, I am working on it right now, I’m trying to get working weapon timers, etc.[/quote]
Alright, but I suggest that you clean out the shitty client class first.

Read full topic
